title: Attend Limestone College Football Games and Stay at Hampton Inn Gaffney SC
text:
Hampton Inn Gaffney SC hotel offers convenient lodging for guests attending Limestone College 2015 football games.
 GAFFNEY, SC, September 01, The Hampton Inn Gaffney SC hotel offers convenient lodging for guests attending Limestone College 2015 football games. The Limestone College Saints will play their season opener on September 5 at home against College of Faith-Charlotte. Kickoff time is 7pm. On September 12 the Saints will host Kentucky Wesleyan at 1pm. Home games are played at The Reservation. Tickets are $13 for reserved seats and $12 for general admission seating. There is a $7 parking fee.
"We look forward to welcoming guests attending Limestone College football games this fall," comments Anil Modi, General Manager at the Hampton Inn Gaffney. "Our award winning property is convenient to downtown Gaffney and the Limestone College campus," explains Modi.
A popular choice among hotels in Gaffney SC , this Hampton Inn received a 2015 TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence Award. Comfortable non-smoking guest rooms feature free high speed Internet and Hampton Clean and Fresh Beds . The refreshing outdoor pool is the perfect place to cool off. Hotel amenities include a business center and guest laundry. The complimentary Hampton on the House Breakfast, with hot and cold favorites, is a delicious way to start the day. Guests with limited time may choose a Hampton On the Run Breakfast Bag on weekday mornings. Nearby Upstate attractions include King's Mountain National Military Park and the Carolina Foothills Artisan Center.
The Hampton Inn Gaffney is located off I-85 at Exit 90. The property is adjacent to the Gaffney Premium Outlets, with some of the best shopping bargains in the Upstate. Current lodging specials include the Weekend Getaway Package, with late checkout. AAA and senior rates are available. HHonors members will earn points toward free nights.
For the Limestone College football schedule, visit www.golimestonesaints.com . To book your stay at the Hampton Inn Gaffney South Carolina hotel , call 864-206-0011 or visit online at www.HAMPTONINNGAFFNEY.com .
About Hampton Inn Gaffney
The Hampton Inn Gaffney Hotel offers a welcome place to rest when you're on the road. Business travelers and vacationers alike will be delighted by the modern conveniences and outstanding service this Gaffney hotel includes. If you've ever wanted to experience true Southern hospitality, you're sure to find it here. The Hampton Inn Gaffney hotel is conveniently located off I-85 next to Hamrick's Department Store and Gaffney Premium Outlets. This property offers a full range of services and amenities to make your stay exceptional.
